refnamediv.refpurpose: Save array data to a file

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The AFL save operator works like the AQL SAVE clause. It saves the data from the cells of a SciDB array into a file.

informalexample.para: This example creates a a matrix with two attributes and saves the cell values to a file.

step.para: Join array1 and array2 and store the output in an array storage_array:store(join(array1,array2),storage_array);This query outputs:[ [(100,200),(101,201),(102,202)], [(103,203),(104,204),(105,205)], [(106,206),(107,207),(108,208)] ]
